name: 3DFPS Finished
description:
This is my finished 3DFPS project for CAS 117

The modifications I made were:

1) Added new terrains to new levels (snow biome, moon biome)

2) Added new levels to evolve story

3) Changed music for each level to fit theme accurately

Fixed bugs with player death that occurred in tutorial.

Created by Cameryn Hatfield using MSU assets, 2021.
